Tool Library

NameODBC/OTL
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2010
Version1.0
File/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/saga/libdb_odbc.so

Description

Database access via Open Data Base Connection (ODBC) interface. Based on the OTL (Oracle, Odbc and DB2-CLI Template Library), Version 4.0: http://otl.sourceforge.net/

Tools

IDName
0Connect to ODBC Source
1Disconnect from ODBC Source
2Commit/Rollback Transaction
3Execute SQL
4List Table Fields
5Import Table
6Export Table
7Drop Table
8Import Table from SQL Query
9List ODBC Servers
10List Tables
11Disconnect All
